channel.title: Server emote interface+equipment interface
channel.description:
On my server for the emotes, there's the old ones with names and their in rows without the pictures, ex:
Yes, Jig, no, wall lean etc.
Also, where you look at the stats, it shows the head, torso, legs, etc and below is your equipment stats and you have to scroll down to see them. How do I change it to the emote section with pictures and the normal equipment screen.

item.title: Server emote interface+equipment interface
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

Well I figured that much but adding it server sided… not so sure.

Read full topic
